title: Ulaganayagan Kamal Haasan alleged for instigating violence against ADMK MLAs - Tamil Movie News

organizations.name: ruling party indian national league party

text: Kamal Haasan goads Sathyaraj and Madhavan to comment Ulaganayagan Kamal Haasan has been unusually vociferous about the political situation in Tamil Nadu and he was especially highly critical of the confidence vote that ADMK won on Saturday. Kamal Had tweeted “There you go. Seems like we have another CM. Jai de-mockcrazy” and “People of Tamizhnadu, Welcome your respective MLAs with the respect they deserve back home”. An affiliate of the ruling party Indian National League Party has lodged a police complaint against Kamal Haasan alleging that he was instigating violence against the ADMK MLAs.
